column6:
Would you trust a man who puts you in harm's way? Someone who throws you into the path of a maniac for what he claims is the greater good? The New Warriors are becoming increasingly suspicious of their leader. When Night Thrasher pits the team against a super-villain who's out of their league, the Warriors are left to wonder: What could possibly be worth their lives?,2008,4
Rated T+ ...$2.99
